name: ngs-route-generator
description: Takes gameId and playId and creates route based on stats
author: Sportradar

scripts.test-route-run1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/freeman-td-run.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-run2: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/freeman-long-run.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-pass1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/hooper-td.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-pass2: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/j-jones-73-td.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-pass3: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/j-jones-sideline-catch.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-pass4: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/sanu-13-pass.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-incomplete1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/edelman-incomplete.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-incomplete2: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/mitchell-incomplete.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-interception1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/brady-interception.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-sack1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/brady-sack.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-sack2: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/ryan-sack.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-punt: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/punt.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-kick1: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/kick.json --handler index.handler
scripts.test-route-kick2: docker-compose run app node-lambda run --eventFile=./test/kick2.json --handler index.handler
scripts.deploy-route: node-lambda deploy --region us-west-2 --functionName ngs-route-generator --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::165158022346:role/lambda_basic_execution --memorySize 1024 --timeout 30 --description 'Creates NGS route visualization' --runtime nodejs4.3 --vpcSubnets subnet-c7aca4b1,subnet-0999686e --vpcSecurityGroups sg-0256517b --excludeGlobs [".env Dockerfile docker-compose* test **/tests states.json .travis.yml ngs-data README.md"]
scripts.test: docker-compose run testapp npm run mocha
